Angela Atede (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke onwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1972) bụ nwaafọ Nigeria na-eme egwuregwu, onye na asọkarị mpi na 100 metres hurdles
Ihe mmeta ya kachasị mma bụ 12.72 sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'afọ 1998.
